text: I will never forget the memories I made there.The teachers are really nice except one PE teacher urm he kinda bias. Anyways there's also this one teacher that tells stories and like is part of the students u get what I mean?I also had this friend group called the chlorophylls like it was both fun and crazy lol ( team chlorophyll )

Bad students. When there was a crowd and we were going to leave the school, there was a green collared pri1-3 himdu boy was fiddling with the keychains on my backpack. When I looked back, he was frowning at me like i did something. When i was walking back, i had noticed that the keychain ring was loose. My bag zip was open and multiple items were missing. What concerns me is that the students around him and me didnt even tell him to stop or anything. Students are also very noisy outside of school and many will disturb you. I dont recommend. Im glad im graduating next year.

amazing experience here and made rlly good friends and i love the teachers (some..) especially Ms Chua, i was damn lucky to hv her as my cher this year since i got psle this year, helped me A LOT. but still mad that they remove p6 childrens day movie lj without giving a reason or even tell us its cancelledðŸ˜’. and also close the playground for most of the years bc of covid, cant blame the school tho. but in the end still made good memories there, will forever miss my time here. sigma schoolðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥(team chlorophyll)

It's a very educational place for your primary kids as the exams are not to hard and not to easy and as well as the teachers are very kind and extremely well for your kids so I recommend you send your primary kids to Park View
